notes: API Keys (Optional but Recommended):
- google_api_key: For Google Custom Search API
- google_cse_id: Custom Search Engine ID
- bing_api_key: For Bing Web Search API
- github.api_token: GitHub Personal Access Token (increases rate limits)
- certspotter_api_key: CertSpotter API key (optional, free tier available)
- pastebin_api_key: Pastebin scraping API key (requires PRO account)
Rate Limits:
- Adjust rate_limits section based on your API quotas
- Free tiers typically have lower limits
- Add delays to avoid triggering anti-bot protections
Output:
- Results saved to 'results/' directory by default
- JSON: Machine-readable, full details
- CSV: Spreadsheet import, flattened data
- HTML: Human-readable report with severity highlighting
Security:
- Never commit this config with real API keys to version control
- Use environment variables for sensitive values
- Rotate API keys regularly
- Restrict file permissions: chmod 600 config.json
